description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This camo-print version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 31½" front body length, a 32½" back body length, a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Size Tall 2L has a 34½" front body length, a 35½" back body length, a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
